### ItinActions {#a7f4af75f09e9716de54d4a7b1ee0095a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ArrayRef&lt;unsigned&gt; llvm::DFAPacketizer::ItinActions</>}>
For every itinerary, an &quot;action&quot; to apply to the automaton.

This removes the redundancy in actions between itinerary classes.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/dfapacketizer-h/#l00079">79</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/dfapacketizer-h">DFAPacketizer.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
